website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced bias tire that works well for small or medium trailers.
pros: This tire is an affordable option that provides good traction and holds air well
Customers praise how smooth the tires feel on the road

customer_reviews.title: No rim!
customer_reviews.text: No rim. Was disappointed. Description or photo needs to be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mountcastle

customer_reviews.title: Good tires,good price!
customer_reviews.text: Put them on our pop up camper. Tire ride good when pulling our camper and for the price you cant beat them. Purchased 4 of them and we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage!!!!The first one blew out in less than 200 miles! We were running easy at 60 mph or less. Sometimes cheaper is not better! Now to find a high quality set of tires so we don’t have to go through this crap again!
customer_reviews.author: gordon lange

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had them long. Bought for a camper I brought home and then used once. They’re tires? They look good and roll fine without vibration on the camper. I usually put it on blocks when I’m not going to use it for awhile but the tires haven’t gone flat in the several months I’ve had them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the right payment card because once you hit the payment button you're commited.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a pop up camper that was converted into a food truck. Haven't put it on the road yet but they seem pretty decent. They do not come with rims which wasnt a problem for me, but it might be for others. Tire shop said they were good tires, they had a little difficulty putting one on the rim but they said it was the rim and not the tire. Came in quicker than dated which was good considering the pandemic. Approximately 2 days. Only thing I didn't like was I couldn't cancel my order 30 secs after paying because I accidentally used my credit card instead of my bank card.
customer_reviews.author: celeste hill

customer_reviews.title: Small trailer tire
customer_reviews.text: My storage trailer tire disintegration this tire replaced it. I still have two more to get. Until I get the trailer rebuilt I won't be using them.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Developed leak after 150 miles
customer_reviews.text: One of four tires developed a pin hole leak in the sidewall after about 150 miles of usage. I would highly recommend avoiding anything from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: demlockian

customer_reviews.title: NO RIM. MISLEADING ADD
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the tire ( without rim) on the day promised. Took 10 mins to get on the rim with a little dish soap. Going to get air in it now. Will post more pics. But seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pavino

customer_reviews.title: Misled
customer_reviews.text: Tire is pictured with rim and no where in the product description did it say no rim. Disappointed about being misled.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Puopolo

customer_reviews.title: Where is 10” Rim
customer_reviews.text: It says 10” rim in product info.... But arrived without rims?
customer_reviews.author: Redtrees

customer_reviews.title: Have the correct rim for the tire to go on.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good seem like a really good tire
customer_reviews.author: Karl Solo

customer_reviews.title: Was not an expensive car and I expected to do well
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to check the durability cuz we haven't put enough miles on the tire but I'm hoping it does well
customer_reviews.author: Conni

customer_reviews.title: Good salad Tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality inexpensive trailer tire nothing out there because the price
customer_reviews.author: michael anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good tire but no rim.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the picture shows with rim, you only get the tire but still a good value for the tire. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Improper pic advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good tire but advertised incorrect .... shows on rim and does not come on rim this picture needs to be changed to show proper .... purchased for a trailer needing rims and tires ... would have bought another set if was shown proper
customer_reviews.author: Snatchman Ent

customer_reviews.title: Does not include wheels eventhough the ad says "5 lug"
customer_reviews.text: The product picture included wheels, the description stated the it included 5 lug wheels, but was not included and had to purchase in addition. Made the price double !!
customer_reviews.author: Telitha

customer_reviews.title: picture not always accurate
customer_reviews.text: The tire is shown with the interior part of the wheel. Thats what I thought I bought. When it arrived it is only the outside rubber part not where you attach it to trailer. Didnt get what I thought I bought.
customer_reviews.author: T Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Rolls on
customer_reviews.text: This wheel rolls well, holds air, and looks great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: Tires without rims
customer_reviews.text: The tires didnt come with rims as shown in the picture...disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast and convient.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tires for my boat so I could be ready for a week vacation at the lake. They arrived on time like they committed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This tor was pictured with wheel and it says tire with wheel extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Roger Groff

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Does not include a rim as pictured. 1/5 stars would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, Amazon not doing a good job on filtering crooks.
customer_reviews.text: Did not buy very mis leading. Picture shows a wheel. BS
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeCoff

product_meta.title: Power King GVM20 Boat II LP Trailer Bias Tire - 20.5X8-10
product_meta.description: Highway Bias Trailer For Use On Small To Medium Size Trailers Bias Ply Construction For Extra Support And Superior Handling Advanced Tubeless Design
feature_bullets: For use on small to medium size trailers
Bias ply construction for extra support and superior handling

specifications.Model: Power King Boat Trailer II LP
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
